channel.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

[quote=“manmanner, post:8, topic:275460”]i fixed it just to discover 100 errors
the first (i can see) is at line 16153
so where should the real error be?[/quote]

You just missed a } to end your code line, thats y you get 100 errors, just search the things you changed and you should find your fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i fixed it just to discover 100 errors
the first (i can see) is at line 16153
so where should the real error be?

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

The keyword “case” only has semantic meaning inside a switch statement. You may have accidentally closed your switch statement with a misplaced “}”.

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

You may of missed a } or break;
Above the case 17

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

it worked before
i never messed with it
heres the full case 17

[code] case 17:
// second Click npc
NPCSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndianA();
if ((NPCSlot < 0) || (NPCSlot >= server.npcHandler.npcs.length)
|| (server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot] == null))
break;
NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
long time = System.currentTimeMillis();
if (misc.random(100) == 1) {
triggerRandom();
break;
}
if (time - globalCooldown[0] <= 50) {
sM(“Action throttled… please wait longer before acting!”);
break;
}
if (time - lastMouse > 5000) {
//sM(“Client hack detected!”);
println(“Suspicious activity!”);
disconnected = true;
break;
}
if(action == 1){
sM(“Suspicious activity!”);
break;
}

		globalCooldown[0] = time;
		int npcX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
		int npcY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
		if ((Math.abs(absX - npcX) > 50) || (Math.abs(absY - npcY) > 50)) {
			//sM("Client hack detected!");
			break;
		}
		if (server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].IsDead) {
			sM("That monster has been killed!");
			break;
		}
		FishingGo = false;
		PutNPCCoords = false;

if(NPCID == 1597){
NpcDialogue = 118;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
}
if(NPCID == 959){
sM(“You have been healed.”);
lowGFX(436, 0);
currentHealth += 10;
if (currentHealth > playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
sendQuest("" + currentHealth + “”, 4016);

}
if(NPCID == 3789){
sendQuest(" “+pcPoints+”", 10379);
showInterface(10294);
}

WanneShop = 33;
}

WanneShop = 3;
} else if ((NPCID == 300) || (NPCID == 844) || (NPCID == 462)) {
/ Essence Mine Guys */
IsUsingSkill = true;
skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
stairs = 26;
stairDistance = 1;

// Magic store owner shop -bakatool

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

Orphaned case means it hasn’t been used in a switch statement

Read full topic

item.title: Orphaned case 17 delta?
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

i tried to make a working quest point system on my delta server
i also made some more quests
but suddenly the compiler said

:: Preparing for compile... :: Auto-setting envriomental variables... :: :: Scanning for latest JDK version... :: :: Found JDK 1.6.0_07 :: Results: client.java:12214: orphaned case case 17: ^ 1 error :: Done! Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .
the code below was like the last thing i made before it turned out weird (its not part of case 17. its part of case 155)

if(NPCID == 297){ if(q16 == 0){ NpcDialogue = 134; NpcDialogueSend = false; } if(q16 == 1 && playerHasItem(286, 1)){ NpcDialogue = 137; NpcDialogueSend = false; q16 = 2; } if(q16 == 2 && playerHasItem(287, 1)){ NpcDialogue = 138; NpcDialogueSend = false; q16 = 3; } if(q16 == 3 && playerHasItem(288, 1)){ NpcDialogue = 139; NpcDialogueSend = false; deleteItem(288, 1); showInterface(297); sendQuest("You have completed Goblin Diplomacy!", 301); q16 = 15; addItem(995, 10000); addSkillXP(1300, 14); qp += 5; /* updateQP(); if (lookNeeded) { showInterface(3559); }*/ sendQuest("@gre@Goblin Diplomacy", 7345); sM("I got some Crafting xp and cash for completing this quest."); } }

Read full topic
